data.text: @holyawkwardness @LaceyLaceyp @MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare @ubccovidtracker Potential for adult supervision—courts, universities—people can be safe. Common people are being thrown to pestilence because Victoria is scared out of its wits. Not helping G&M editorial howled for dropping Emergencies Act. Now we see results. Horgan out of his mind with fear.

@holyawkwardness @LaceyLaceyp @MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare @ubccovidtracker But did stimulus for this letter come from a faction within UBC itself? It would not surprise me if UBC University Counsel Hubert Lai cooked it up. 

Mike Farnworth yelled that he could not be intimidated by a mob. But with a Victoria protest in the works he ran like a rabbit.
@NicoTheHut @laughingtrish @MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare You must be one of those nuts that believes every idiot thing your fave media says. Bye bye.
@laughingtrish @WordStitcher @MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare Nope 👎🏼. the whole rest of the world has ended Mandates what rock are you living under.

@NicoTheHut @WordStitcher @MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare The science by the REAL scientists (not Drs being pushed by politicians) know that we are still very much in a pandemic, not even close to endemic yet. Just waiting for the next variant to come and bite our asses.
@MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare You’re all a bundle of sticks for peddling fearporn on Covid at this point. https://t.co/awoUgv24xq
@MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare Also, how do you report tweets as misinformation? I thought that was only in US.

@MDrelichman @VCHhealthcare Why do people, especially health are officials, state "it's endemic" like that means its not harmful, so we won't notice it anymore and don't need to protect ourselves?

Also endemic in certain areas:
Ebola
Malaria
Rabies
TB

Aka: not something to dismiss like the common cold.
